    • Method Detail

      • allocate

        public static MappedBytes allocate(File file,
                                   int size)
        Allocates a mapped buffer in FileChannel.MapMode#READ_WRITE mode.

        Memory will be mapped by opening and expanding the given File to the desired count and mapping the file contents into memory via FileChannel.map(FileChannel.MapMode, long, long).

        Parameters:
        file - The file to map into memory. If the file doesn't exist it will be automatically created.
        size - The count of the buffer to allocate (in bytes).
        Returns:
        The mapped buffer.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - If file is null
        IllegalArgumentException - If count is greater than MappedMemory.MAX_SIZE
        See Also:
        allocate(File, FileChannel.MapMode, int)

      • allocate

        public static MappedBytes allocate(File file,
                                   FileChannel.MapMode mode,
                                   int size)
        Allocates a mapped buffer.

        Memory will be mapped by opening and expanding the given File to the desired count and mapping the file contents into memory via FileChannel.map(FileChannel.MapMode, long, long).

        Parameters:
        file - The file to map into memory. If the file doesn't exist it will be automatically created.
        mode - The mode with which to map the file.
        size - The count of the buffer to allocate (in bytes).
        Returns:
        The mapped buffer.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - If file is null
        IllegalArgumentException - If count is greater than Integer.MAX_VALUE
        See Also:
        allocate(File, int)
